item.description:
Crown Plaza SINGLES DANCE Nashua 
Saturday, June 11th. 
8:00 PM to 1 am. 
Crown Plaza 
exit 8 off of rt. 3 
Nashua, NH 03061

Proper attire is required. No jeans or sneakers, no work boots

Cover Charge goes from $12 to $15 after 9 pm.

Host: Steve Obermiller. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

    Please join Steve O. and about 20 to 40+ friends for an evening of dancing and socializing. This is the largest Singles Dances in NH, with between 200 and 300 singles, in a ballroom setting. Yet, this is not a Ballroom Dance. So, all you need to do is just shake it to dance here. This Dance has the most tasteful variety of people and ages you will find anywhere. Please get there as close to 8 pm as possible. So, you can meet some new people as, Steve O. tries to introduces you to the people at our tables. Because of the popularity of this Dance.

Tables and seats will be hard to hold, much past 8:30. Also, if you are late?

The Cover Charge goes from $12 to $15 after 9 pm. 

Ask where Steve O., or Meetup is sitting as you pay at the door. They will show you where we are sitting. Also look for our signs on our tables.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Crown Plaza Singles Dance Nashua
